product_name: Craft PB Bib Bike Shorts - Men's
long_description: Ride uphills and long stretches in comfort wearing the Craft PB Bib Bike Shorts for men. Polyester/elastane fabric in 6-panel construction supports your muscles with a great ergonomic fit and wicks away sweat fast to keep you cool. Mesh upper breathes easily. Performance chamois provides dense foam, a 4-way-stretch top layer and anti-shock EVA. Craft PB Bib Bike Shorts for men offer reflective trim for enhanced visibility.
short_description: Ride uphills and long stretches in comfort wearing the Craft PB Bib Bike Shorts for men.
